name: The Backrooms - Coming Soon! (Early Access...)
description:
The Backrooms is based on a creepypasta called: "The Backrooms"

This is a survival game where you want to escape quickly! There is only 1 exit, many levels, food, drinks, med-kits and other things!

Beware of the Entities of the Levels!

Warning:
This game could trigger: epilepsy.

Note: This is a game that has to be beaten fast! There is no saving, at all...
